title: Succubus Revealed (Georgina Kincaid #6)
description:
Storyline:

Georgina Kincaid Book 6: Succubus Revealed

After everyone finds out about Georgina's phase with Seth during his and Maddie's engagement, things degenerate at Georgina's workplace and she quits. In the opening of the sixth book she works as one of Santa's elfs in a Mall when she suddenly gets a notice that she has been transfered to Las Vegas.
author: Richelle Mead
